name: Linker (JoshYKC)
description:
A 2D reflex arcade game, destroy blocks with a link.

Prototype made to simulate tower generators when 2 are within range to create an electrical link to destroy anomalies.

---

How To Play?
  1. Use the mouse to move the blue blocks.
  2. Create a link when they're close to each other to destroy the red blocks.
  3. Press any key to continue on Game Over screen.

Get as many score as possible! Please note that this was made originally for mobile space. Apology for the controls on the browser!

Credits

Prototype made by Joshua Yau
With game engine Stencyl
